SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.commands

Class DelayedCommandInputRequest<T>

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.util.delayedinput.DelayedInputRequest<T>
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.commands.DelayedCommandInputRequest<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of data that is to be retrieved from the player.
public final class DelayedCommandInputRequest<T> extends DelayedInputRequest<T>
Represents a request for delayed additional input for a command.

Taking the AddOwner command as an example, it could be initialized using a GUI, in which case it is known who the ICommandSender is and what the target AbstractStructure is. However, for some GUIs (e.g. Spigot), it is not yet known who the target player is and what the desired permission level is. This class can then be used to retrieve the additional data that is required to execute the command.

Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • provide

      public CompletableFuture<?> provide(Object input)
      Provides the input object as input for this input request. See DelayedInputRequest.set(Object).

      If the provided input is not of the correct type as defined by inputClass, a future containing a false boolean is returned to indicate incorrect command usage.

      Parameters:
      input - The input object to provide.
      Returns:
      When the input is of the correct type, commandOutput is returned, otherwise false.

    • cleanup

      protected void cleanup()
      Description copied from class: DelayedInputRequest
      Runs after the request has closed. Either because input was provided or because the request timed out.

      See DelayedInputRequest.getStatus().

      Overrides:
      cleanup in class DelayedInputRequest<T>
